Text: The whole everything about Islam is beautiful .
Be motivated, go about your lawful activities and earn a decent living, if no one is encouraging you, encourage yourself.
One of my goals this year is to convert at least 5 hindus to Islam with the help of Allah. All hindus reading this, come to Islam
If it’s written for you, it will happen.

Calling all Brothers and Sisters in Islam 

Let's unite for a common cause! How about establishing a fund together? Our goal: Empower fellow graduates and undergraduates with tech skills through the generated funds. No sect or aqeedah involved, just collective growth!
May Allah bless you with someone who you can grow old with, and reunite with them in Jannah.
